00075 static struct workqueue_task launch_application;
00076 
00077 static void setup_root_window(void)
00078 {
00079         // Set transparent background window
00080         struct win_window *win_root;
00081         struct win_attributes attr;
00082 
00083         win_root = win_get_root();
00084         attr = *win_get_attributes(win_root);
00085         attr.background = NULL;
00086         win_set_attributes(win_root, &attr, WIN_ATTR_BACKGROUND);
00087         win_show(win_root);
00088 }
00089 
00090 int main(void)
00091 {
00092         cpu_irq_enable();
00093         sysclk_init();
00094         dbg_init();
00095         board_init();
00096         led_activate(BOARD_LED0_ID);
00097         workqueue_init(&main_workqueue);
00098 #ifdef CONFIG_TOUCH_RESISTIVE
00099         touch_init();
00100         touch_enable();
00101 #endif
00102         gfx_init();
00103         membag_init(CPU_DMA_ALIGN);
00104         win_init();
00105 
00106         setup_root_window();
00107 
00108         // Setup task for starting the application
00109         workqueue_task_init(&launch_application, app_widget_launch);
00110 
00111         // Start calibration with task for starting application afterwards
00112         app_touch_calibrate_setup(&launch_application);
00113 
00114         // Start processing workqueue
00115         mainloop_run(&main_workqueue);
00116 }
